Recommendations.Title: PLANNING DEVELOPMENT SERVICES WEEKLY LIST OF ... (23 December 2023)

Official source of Havant Borough Council's planning information.
The application is still under consideration, making it relevant for potential follow-up updates.

Furthermore, it comes from an official source and is still under evaluation.
